Japan sees 2.69 mln visitors in January, matching 2019's record paceJapan welcomed more than 2 million visitors for an eighth consecutive month in January, official data showed on Wednesday, setting the stage for a potential record year for tourism. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:36:14 GMT F5CNXWRKWZPDVNO2OQBRQS5Z34 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-sees-269-mln-visitors-january-matching-2019s-record-pace-2024-02-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
EU approves 13th sanctions package against Russia, says BelgiumThe European Union on Wednesday approved its 13th package of sanctions against Russia, the EU's Belgian presidency said on social media platform X, confirming what sources had earlier told Reuters. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:30:07 GMT 56YL2XEKYNMADNV2YBLHS2INFI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-approves-13th-sanctions-package-against-Russia-eu-sources-2024-02-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Greek farmers join tractor protest in front of parliament for second dayGreek farmers honked their tractor horns in front of parliament on Wednesday after spending the night in central Athens as their protest against rising fuel and production costs stretched into a second day. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:07:09 GMT PXUGZYDPHBOOVCQNR3GDW362BI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/greek-farmers-join-tractor-protest-front-parliament-second-day-2024-02-21/Reuters世界欧洲
On frontline Taiwan islands, fishermen wary of China tensionsTaiwanese fishermen in sensitive waters around frontline islands near the Chinese coast say they are worried about rising tensions, after two Chinese nationals died during a chase with Taiwan's coast guard. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:02:55 GMT UXJ4Z36N7NJNFJN4RSJC3VIRLE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/frontline-taiwan-islands-fishermen-wary-china-tensions-2024-02-21/Ann Wang, Walid Berrazeg世界亚太地区
Iran dismisses plan by U.N. nuclear watchdog head to visit next monthIran's nuclear chief on Wednesday dismissed a suggestion that the head of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) Rafael Grossi would visit Iran next month but instead invited Grossi to a conference in Tehran in May. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 08:48:04 GMT 5BHZXPVP4FOD7IDDIXLBW5HCG4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-dismisses-plan-by-un-nuclear-watchdog-head-visit-next-month-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中东
France's Attal promises new price law to appease angry farmersThe French government will prepare by the summer a new law to better safeguard farmers' income and strengthen their position in negotiations with retailers and consumer goods companies, Prime Minister Gabriel Attal said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 08:38:36 GMT 7RHAHD3LCVLODAYGXWWO6GE6IY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/frances-attal-promises-new-price-law-appease-angry-farmers-2024-02-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Sydney martial arts instructor arrested for alleged murder of South Korean familyA Sydney martial arts instructor has been arrested for the alleged triple murder of a South Korean family living in the city after a child and woman were found dead in a Taekwondo centre, Australian police said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 07:53:07 GMT VVU4IYWGPVM7ZLGRDSI4KQDBLM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/sydney-martial-arts-instructor-arrested-alleged-murder-south-korean-family-2024-02-21/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
Israeli airstrike kills two people in Damascus, Syrian state TV saysAn Israeli airstrike hit a residential building in the Kafr Sousa district in Syria's capital Damascus on Wednesday, killing two people, Syrian state media and a security source said. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 07:24:29 GMT F7VMRFVYU5LFBJE5CDFPCUCTGU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/syrian-state-media-says-several-israeli-missiles-hit-damascus-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中东
Nukes in space: What have Russia and the United States said?Unidentified sources in the United States say Russia is developing a space-based anti-satellite nuclear weapon but President Vladimir Putin said he opposes nuclear weapons in space and Moscow has flatly denied the U.S. assertions. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 07:10:28 GMT 33TKBBVIT5NMTAJFTACEHXJ7TM https://www.reuters.com/world/nukes-space-what-have- Russia-united-states-said-2024-02-21/Guy Faulconbridge, Arshad Mohammed世界
Ukraine outnumbered, outgunned, ground down by relentless RussiaAs the Ukraine war enters its third year, the infantry of 59th Brigade are confronting a bleak reality: they're running out of soldiers and ammunition to resist their Russian invaders. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 07:08:53 GMT 6Y6ZRKJP6BO2HE5IUTXVMOT3RQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-outnumbered-outgunned-ground-down-by-relentless-Russia-2024-02-21/Max Hunder世界欧洲
As Rafah braces for Israeli ground assault, Biden says 'ceasefire' more oftenU.S. President Joe Biden spent months wanting a "pause" in the fighting between Israel and Hamas in Gaza. But with Israel preparing for a ground offensive in Rafah, his rhetoric is shifting to emphasize the need for a "temporary ceasefire". Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:04:13 GMT VKVA3SVZL5PARFTMFZIJX2E3RY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/rafah-braces-israeli-ground-assault-biden-says-ceasefire-more-often-2024-02-21/ Steve Holland, Michelle Nichols, Humeyra Pamuk, David Brunnstrom世界中东
